captcha.moorlCaptchaToDescription: Set a timeout. If the form is submitted earlier, the captcha is invalid.
captcha.moorlCaptchaToAllowRetry: Do not reset captcha on failure (XHR based forms)

moorlCaptchaBw.description: This captcha searches the data sent for patterns, such as bad words. As soon as a pattern matches, the captcha is invalid.

helpText.name: Use * for all fields or comma for multiple fields. e.g. email,firstname,lastname...
helpText.regex: Use regular expressions to detect bad words. Example: /(?:bull)shit/i
